Hi and Welcome!

My Name is Zoé Leandra and I’m a freelance Concept Artist / Illustrator and Game Designer from Berlin, Germany. I am currently enrolled at Games Academy Game Art Program, from which I will graduate November 2017.

I received my Classical Animation Diploma in Vancouver, Canada at the Vancouver Film School in 2013.
I received my Game Design Diploma in Berlin, Germany at the Games Academy in 2015.

I’m much interested in Freelance, Contract and Full Time Employment Positions. Please note I do not work for free,- even if you offer me an amazing showcase.

For any inquiries, please feel free to contact me at zoe.leandra@gmail.com I always check them regularly during the day.

For more about me feel free to check out an Interview for Deutschland.de (in English) and Games Academy Artist Program (in German)
